name: .PSD1 File Extension
summary: Learn about .PSD1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Windows PowerShell, a shell program that includes more advanced features than the Windows Command Prompt; contains various configuration information for a PowerShell script or module.

content: PSD1 files are used for storing module manifest information in hash table format. They are also used for localizing PowerShell troubleshooting packs.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
